source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery shot captures a dramatic event at dusk. A large brick building is shown exploding in a massive, bright fireball. The initial blast gives way to smaller, fiery explosions before the entire structure is consumed by thick black smoke.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery shot captures a dramatic event at dusk. A large brick building is shown exploding in a massive, bright fireball. The initial blast gives way to smaller, fiery explosions before the entire structure is consumed by thick black smoke.

generated_critique: The video does not show any vehicles moving through the scene.

The initial blast gives way to smaller, fiery explosions before the entire structure is consumed by thick black smoke, with no vehicles moving through the scene.
